metadata.title: Get Started on HCP
metadata.description: Quickly get hands-on with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Consul using the HCP portal quickstart deployment, learn about intentions, and route traffic using service resolvers and service splitters.

collection.name: Get Started with HCP Consul Dedicated
collection.description: Quickly get hands-on with HashiCorp Cloud Platform (HCP) Consul using the HCP portal quickstart deployment, learn about intentions, and route traffic using service resolvers and service splitters.

tutorials.name: Deploy HCP Consul Dedicated
tutorials.description: Deploy an end-to-end development environment, complete with an HVN, a HCP  Consul server cluster, a Consul client and demo application running on AWS EKS (Kubernetes) or EC2 (virtual machines).

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

defaultContext.name: Get Started with HCP Consul Dedicated

tutorials.name: Manage service access permission with intentions
tutorials.description: After you have set up the HCP Consul Dedicated end-to-end (quickstart) deployment, create and modify intentions to learn how Consul manages service-to-service authorization and access permissions.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

defaultContext.name: Get Started with HCP Consul Dedicated

tutorials.name: Upgrade services with canary deployments
tutorials.description: After you have set up the HCP Consul Dedicated end-to-end (quickstart) deployment,  create service splitters and service resolvers to gradually and safely  promote your services.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

defaultContext.name: Get Started with HCP Consul Dedicated

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
